trends: There have been 106 other sightings in Colorado Springs
There were no other sightings in Colorado Springs on or around March 13th 2002
Summary: Over Pikes Peak a bright light that was not moving
divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking at computer screen when I looked out my window and there was abright light just North and over Pikes Peak. At first I thought it was a star,but the stars were not out at that time. The light was steady (no blinking) Igot 2 of my bonoculars out and watched with my son this thing hover in thesky.We watched for about 10 min. and then it drifted behind the mountain.
